title: Email Signup Lightbox - v2
description: Form lightbox with one image creative and an optional thank you creative.

input.name: htmlstring
input.value: <form action="/email-signup" class="form"><input class="form-control" maxlength="80" name="emailAddress" placeholder="Sign up for emails" required="" title="Email Address" type="email" /> </form>

widget.label: Lightbox Image Creative.
widget.description: Optional #close clickzone. To display form inputs, add clickzones that correspond with form input names: i.e. input name='email' would need clickzone with href='#email'. Alternatively, you can name the clickzone in the form using a clickzone attribute (input clickzone='email')

widget.label: Lightbox ID - Pick a number that is distinct from other lightboxes (0-31 only)
widget.description: Differentiates this lightbox from others for this retailer.
How long until the this lightbox is shown again. Based on lightboxId.
widget.label: How often (per user) should this lightbox be shown?

widget.description: What form submission method should we use?
widget.label: Which submission method is preferred?
Optional Thank You Creative (#close)
widget.description: Displays upon successful email collection. Optional #close clickzone. Lightbox will automatically close on submit without any creative.

widget.label: Lightbox Class
widget.description: A class to add to the lightbox for styling purposes.

input.name: opt_appendCSS

widget.label: Top Position
widget.description: The top offset of the lightbox (in pixels).

widget.label: Left Position
widget.description: The left offset of the lightbox (in pixels).

widget.label: Pin Lightbox Position?
widget.description: Is the lightbox pinned to its position on screen, or does it scroll with the page?

widget.label: Overlay Color
widget.description: Color of the lightbox overlay. Defaults to "#000".

widget.label: Overlay Opacity
widget.description: Opacity of the lightbox overlay. Defaults to "0.6".

widget.label: Closeable?
widget.description: Is the lightbox closeable by clicking on the overlay?

widget.label: Refresh After?
widget.description: Should the page reload after closing the thank you lightbox? (This is useful for sign-in lightboxes!)

widget.label: Responsive?
widget.description: Select yes to make the lightbox responsive.
Defaults to 'Valid email address required.' if no error message is provided.
